Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoTaggingService provides various ways to retrieve tags and can add tags to a node in a Alfresco repository.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all tags available in the repository.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved tags in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all tags available in the repository with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the tags.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved tags in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all tags applied to a given node.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node for which the tags should be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved tags in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves all tags applied to a given node with a listing context.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node for which the tags should be retrieved.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: The listing context with a paging definition that's used to retrieve the tags.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved tags in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Adds the given tags to the given node.

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: The tags that should be added.

Parameter.Name: node
Parameter.Abstract: The node to which the tags should be added.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved tags in case the operation succeeds.
